DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study describe outcomes patient Upper Gastrointestinal Bleed ( UGIB ) real-life setting . Additionally analyse assessed predictor outcome , include impact hemostatic endoscopic pharmacologic therapy .
DOC.brief_title: Survey Non-Variceal Upper Gastro Intestinal Bleeding Vietnamese Patients
DOC.criteria: Adult patient ( > =18yrs ) admit hospital , inpatient admit another reason , present overt nonvariceal upper GI bleed manifest hematemesis/coffee ground vomiting , melena , hematochezia ... Evidence upper GI endoscopy perform GI bleed NVUGIB
